topics.body:
Good morning meatbags.

I had a really weird dream. One that was very realistic.
I had a dream about a misterious guy that had the mission to kill someone important. I don't know if was a president or a mayor.
Then, he walked and entered to a building and looked at the window. He weared a sunglasses and looked at the people. After some seconds, the grabbed the Sniper rifle and aimed to the objetive but was spotted by the security and they started to shoot at him.

I don't why I dreamed this, because I haven't watched anything related to this or played any First Person Shooting game.
